the source Full interviews here Unsolved Mysteries Full stories here **KNVN FCC Applications** Jul 21, 2022 Jul 21, 2022UpdatedAug 1, 2022 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save On July 25, 2022, Maxair Media License Company, LLC, licensee of K31ND-D, Channel 31 Oroville, California, filed an application with the Federal Communications Commission for renewal of its broadcast license. Members of the public wishing to view this application or obtain information about how to file comments and petitions on the application can visitwww.fcc.gov/stationsearch, and search in the list of K31ND-D’s filed applications.
